dsOverview.title: NMC Global Tropospheric Analyses, CDROM subset, daily January to June 1991

summary.p: NCEP Global Analyses on 145 by 37 2.5 degree grids, one for each hemisphere. Has surface, tropospheric, tropopause, and lower stratospheric analyses; at mandatory levels up to 50 millibars. More... This is a subset of the data in DS082.0.and is identical except that it is in GRIB format on CDROM in. Every CDROM contains six months of data.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NWS/NCEP > National Centers for Environmental Prediction, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
